summary: This mod adds Raziel, the character of the Soul Reaver series to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver Raziel


This mod adds Raziel the main character of the Soul Reaver video game to Skyrim.

You got five armor parts, body, boots, gauntlets, wings and head.
All textures made from scatch.
The model is based on the vanilla malebody_0, the armbandages from the Skyrim game, both heavily modified, and on the vanilla skeleton spine, retextured.
Other than this all models are created from scratch.

All items are forgeable in the Dragon section, upgradable, enchantable.No perk needed.

Installation:
NNM ready.Just download form NMM and install.

Uninstall:
Use NMM to remove the mod.

Issues:
It is possible to wear all parts separately, but due to the nature of the models, you\\\'ll look weird. ; )
the wings world model is using a vanilla amulet world model because all world models I did, sucked a lot. :(

Permissions:
Do not modify this mod or upload it anywhere without my permission.


Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim
Crystal Dynamics and Eidos Interactive for the Soul reaver game series.
All people here on the Nexus , kind enough to share their knowledge.Thanks.
 
Hope you enjoy it.

AthenaX
author: AthenaX
